name: Undead
description: Succubi are considered undead and therefore have multiple buffs and debuffs due to this.

badges.text: §eYou are immune to the §npoison§e status effect.
§eYou are immune to the §nregeneration§e status effect.
§eYou take damage from the §ninstant health§e status effect.
§eYou heal instead of taking damage when hit with the §ninstant damage§e status effect.
§eYou take extra damage 2.5 damage for every level of §nsmite§e the attacker uses.
